text:
"Amal" quotes the movement as the first to object to the project of "Eden Bay"
06 Nov 2019, 22:42 by Lebanon 24
The Central Media Office of Amal Movement denied a statement that Al-Jadeed TV reported a clash between the movement's supporters and demonstrators in front of the Eden Bay Hotel. He said that "the movement was the first to object to this project, and demanded and demands the judiciary to seize these blatant aggressions firmly address every attack on public property." He stressed that "what was reported by the channel is a pure slander", called on the media office of "Amal" to "all media not to publish any news before verifying its authenticity."
